jp_text: （カンベエ）ゴロベエは… 死んだ

en_text: The bandits have been defeated.
jp_text: （カンベエ）野伏せりは倒した

en_text: Now, I will fulfill\nthe oath I made to you.
jp_text: 今度は お前たちとの誓いを果たす
google_translated: This time, play a vow with you

en_text: As with Rikichi's wife, your sister\nis most likely in the capital.
jp_text:
リキチの女房と同様
お前の妹御も 恐らくは都に
google_translated:
Similar to Riki's wife
Your sister is also a city

en_text: The capital?
jp_text: 都？
